-- After we need to crerate creadential

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL demoCredentialdedicated
WITH IDENTITY = 'managed identity'
GO
 

-- After we need to crerate external datasources

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE demoExtDataSourceDadicated WITH
(
    LOCATION = 'https://synapsestoragee.dfs.core.windows.net/',
    CREDENTIAL = demoCredentialdedicated
);
